text: The Chromebook Challenge is a challenge that emerged on TikTok where students put objects into their computer port and it would start letting out smoke. There have been reported evacuations and injuries. == When it started == The trend started in 2025, early May, when a TikTok video of someone putting in a small item into the USB port of their computer, causing smoke to come out. The video went viral and it started the the Chromebook Challenge. The person who did this was arrested and charged with multiple felonies like 3rd degree arson. == References ==
title: Chromebook Challenge
